quarter cup of chopped ginger 4 cloves
of garlic a tablespoon of coarse salt
now if you're using fine salt make sure
you only use a teaspoon and a half or
you will be overwhelmed by saltiness 3

like a safflower oil or even a canola
oil will work and a teaspoon of lime
zest this makes such a flavorful pace
that you rub under your chicken you're
not gonna believe what a difference it
makes in your roasted chicken and then
just puree everything to a paste
you're only gonna need half of this

a four pound chicken sometimes they'll
